name: Battles of Hexagonia
description:
Battles of Hexagonia is an isometric turn-based strategy game that features:

  • 9 different classes with unique spells
  • Player progression with a reward system
  • Multiplayer strategy battles on mobile devices
  • A unique point system that makes killing your enemy not your only priority
  • Assembling a team of different units to fit your playstyle
Team

This game was developed by four students from Austria as a semester project.

Alexander Müller
